product_name: Charlotte TilburyUnreal Lips Healthy Glow Nectar Oil
summary: SummaryCharlotte Tilbury's Unreal Lips Healthy Glow Nectar Oil hydrates lips while leaving a glossy, glass-like finish for juicy lips in one swipe! The lip-hugging applicator perfectly contours your lips!
details: DetailsBenefitsA cushioning comfort of a nourishing balmThe glow glide of an oil with a blend of skin-barrier boosting ingredientsDesigned to play with the light to make your lips look plump in just one swipe!Available in multiple shades, 2 with pH technology to enhance your natural lip color!Research ResultsClinically Proven Key Claims:Lips are 3.4x more hydrated/moisturized after 1 hour*Lips are 40% more hydrated after 24 hours**Tested on 32 peopleUser trial results:Over 96% agree it feels weightless*Over 90% agree it does not feel sticky*Over 90% agree lips look + feel hydrated**Tested on over 104 people over 1 week. Combined results across all 6 scent shades.Key IngredientsHyaluronic Acid microspheres deeply hydrates and creates a volumizing effect that visibly smooths vertical lip lines.Vitamin E and a potent blend of antioxidant-rich Fruit Oils leave lips feeling irresistibly soft and smooth.Item 2641375How To UseGlide on using the lip-hugging applicator!IngredientsJuicylicious Candy Fig: Polybutene, Hydrogenated Polydecene, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hydrogenated Didecene, Diisostearyl Malate, Hydrogenated Styrene/Isoprene Copolymer, Silica Silylate, Parfum (Fragrance), Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Tocopheryl Acetate, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Olus Oil/Vegetable Oil/Huile V√©g√©tale, Prunus Persica (Peach) Kernel Oil, Rubus Idaeus (Raspberry) Seed Oil, Silica Dimethyl Silylate, Tocopherol, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Hexylene Glycol, Vanillin. May Contain: Iron Oxides (CI 77491), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Red 28 Lake (CI 45410), Yellow 5 Lake (CI 19140).Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Glide on using the lip-hugging applicator!

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I love this lip oil so much! It feels so nice and hydrating on the lips and it gives a ton of shine to them; it's lightweight and very comfortable and it smells so delicious too! The packaging is failed cute and girly and I so happy with it!

reviews.headline: Moisturizing and healthy glow.
reviews.comments: Unreal lips healthy glow nectar oil is very healthy specially for dry lips. The oil typically contains beneficial ingredients like natural oils and antioxidants, contributing to smoother, plumper lips. It has a delicious soft watermelon flavor!!

reviews.headline: Moisturizing lip gloss with a healthy glow.
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Unreal lips healthy glow nectar oil is very healthy specially for dry lips. The oil typically contains beneficial ingredients like natural oils and antioxidants, contributing to smoother, plumper lips. It has a delicious soft watermelon flavor!!

reviews.headline: Beautiful clear lip oil
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] This is a beautiful lips oil oil. It  looks beautiful over lip stains or on it's own.It has a slight vanilla scent. The applicator fits your lips perfectly. It's not sticky at all. It gives you beautiful hydrated and healthy lips.

reviews.headline: Love the shine
reviews.comments: I'm absolutely thrilled with my new Unreal Lips Health Glow Nectar oil by Charlotte Tilbury. It glides on effortlessly, enveloping my lips in a luxurious, moisturizing layer that enhances their natural beauty. The delightful watermelon scent is refreshing and subtle, adding just the right touch without being overwhelming. With a hint of tint, this oil beautifully enhances my lips, infusing them with a vibrant, colorful glow that brightens my smile. It's the perfect finishing touch for any look!

reviews.headline: Love this stuff
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] One of the Beauty influencers that I follow always talks about this brand, but it is always been out of my budget. I was super excited to try this and give my review and I am very happy with it. I love coconut so this was perfect for me and this left my lips feeling absolutely amazing especially now with the season changes as I am in New England. I highly recommend this, especially if you are a fan of coconut.

reviews.headline: Yummy lip oil
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. I really enjoy using this lip oil! It reminds me of the juicy tubes of my youth. Mine was coconut-scented, and it was very pleasant to wear. It definitely helped enhance my lips, but I don't think they are noticeably bigger or plumper. I think using this adds the extra pop (without the hassle) of lipstick when I am dressing up. I would recommend this product! Also, it did not dry out or chap my lips like some products do.

reviews.headline: Moisturizing lip product with a healthy glow.
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Unreal lips healthy glow nectar oil is very healthy specially for dry lips. The oil typically contains beneficial ingredients like natural oils and antioxidants, contributing to smoother, plumper lips. It has a delicious soft watermelon flavor!!

reviews.headline: Whoa!!
reviews.comments: Whoa! I was NOT expecting this lippie to smell as heavenly and as strong as it does! I am a big fan of the scented lippie trend that has been happening lately but a lot of them just smell sort of faint or the scent fades away pretty quickly. But this gorgeous watermelon scent is intoxicating! It is ph powered so the shade adapts to your lips to give you your own personal color. It really hydrates my lips but I do find this lip oil to be just a tiny bit sticky unfortunately. It helps if I only apply a small amount, which is what I have been doing. Other than that, I really love this nectar oil lippie!

reviews.headline: Ph lip oil
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I recently tried out the Unreal Lips Healthy Glow Nectar Oil in Juicylicious Pink Watermelon, and I'm pleasantly surprised. On first swipe you get this sheer candy-pink tint (Charlotte calls it a "pink watermelon") that adapts slightly to your own lip pH ‚Äî so it ends up looking pretty unique rather than just one flat pink.
The finish is really glossy ‚Äî think glassy shine, juicy, kind of like a hybrid of a balm + gloss + lip oil. It gives lips dimension without feeling sticky or heavy.

reviews.headline: Great formula and finish
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] My go-to lipgloss lately! This Charlotte Tilbury Unreal Lip Oil checks all the boxes for a lip oil. It doesn't feel like those typical greasy lip oils that tend to slide around and end up being messy. It's quite a thick consistency that stays put and doesn't feel sticky at all. The finish is super high gloss, giving the appearance of fuller lips. One of my favorite parts is the coconut scent which reminds me of summer and gives that nostalgic feeling. Overall, it's a great formula and great finish!

reviews.headline: I am obsessed
reviews.comments: Just tried the Charlotte Tilbury Unreal Lips Healthy Glow Nectar Oil in Juicylicious Pink Watermelon üçâüíñ and I'm obsessed! It gives the perfect sheer wash of pink while drenching my lips in hydration. The texture is silky, non-sticky, and feels more like a nourishing treatment than a gloss. Plus, the glow it leaves is chef's kiss ‚ú® ‚Äî fresh, juicy, and perfect for everyday wear. Definitely a summer must-have! üíï

reviews.headline: I would buy it again
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] It has thick texture which helps keep skin moist. Coconut scent is also my favorite one. I keep using it twice a day and my lips have improved a lot. It used to be really dry.

reviews.headline: Juicy hydrated lips
reviews.comments: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. This lip oil is super hydrating. The formula is great. It is not sticky and has a nice cushion. This gives the lips a beautiful shine and fuller appearance. The coconut scent is really nice and not overpowering. This is a great clear gloss use on its own or as a topper. The applicator is curved to hug your lips providing and easy and even application. The packaging is super cute and I love the iridescent details.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I love this lip oil! It applies so smooth and I really appreciate how it isn't sticky or tacky. It hydrates my lips and makes them look so good! It seems to last a long time too!

reviews.headline: A winning lipstick üíÑ‚ú®
reviews.comments: The scent is delicious, it's not sticky, and it feels super lightweight on the lips üòç. Plus, it looks beautiful, and I love the applicator ‚Äî its shape makes it so easy to apply. Definitely a winner! üôå

reviews.headline: SO GOOD
reviews.comments: This is such an amazing product. i got the watermelon one. i was a little nervous at first about the pH adjusting part because those are usually gimmicky, but this gave me SUCH a pretty lip color. the consistency is super smooth and lasts for a long time.

reviews.headline: So juicy!
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Looking for a juicy lip oil that leaves your lips shiny and hydrated? Check out this one from Charlotte Tilbury! 

What is it? A hydrating lip oil that leaves a glossy, juicy, glass like finish minus the stickiness, and it also feels very lightweight. 

It has a nice blend of Hyaluronic Acid plus vitamins E and A. 

Available in 7 flavors with 2 of these flavors including pH technology to enhance your natural lip color 

The perfect size for carrying everywhere! I got the coconut water flavor and wow! It smells absolutely nice, like a tropical vacay in my pocket ü••üíó

reviews.headline: This gloss has officially earned a permanent spot in my purs
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] I've been obsessed with the Charlotte Tilbury UNREAL LIPS Healthy Glow Nectar Oil in Juicylicious Pink Watermelon, and here's why:

Texture: It feels like the softest watermelon jelly ‚Äî lightweight, cushiony, and so smooth. Honestly, it's so juicy-looking that you almost want to eat it!

Scent: The scent is divine ‚Äî a fresh, sweet watermelon cocktail that instantly reminds me of summer days by the ocean. It's refreshing without being overwhelming.

Ingredients: I love that it's packed with nourishing oils that actually make my lips feel healthier with every use, not just glossy on the surface.

Application: The applicator is a game-changer! It's soft, semi-transparent, and glides perfectly over the lips. One swipe gives an even, juicy finish without any mess.

Packaging: Chic and elegant, very Charlotte Tilbury. It looks gorgeous in my bag and feels luxe every time I pull it out.

‚ú® Overall, I'm beyond impressed. It's not sticky, it adapts beautifully to my lip tone with a subtle color shift, and it lasts really well. This gloss has officially earned a permanent spot in my purse!

reviews.headline: Buying it in every color!
reviews.comments:
[I received this product in exchange for my honest review] 
The silkiest, glossiest lip product I've ever used! It's so easy to apply with its curved lip part, smells like a Hawaiian summer, perfect size, I'm obsessed with it!!

faceoff_positive.comments: [I received this product in exchange for my honest review] Pink Watermelon opens the door to a playful yet refined lip experience from Charlotte Tilbury. The shade Pink Watermelon reads as a bright, candy-pink with a sunny coral undertone that livens the face. The texture is a sophisticated hybrid, balancing lip oil nourishment with a glassy, lipstick-like luminosity. It glides onto lips with a featherweight feel, making it comfortable enough for all-day wear. The finish is a radiant gloss that catches light without looking sticky or overly slick. In terms of pigment, Pink Watermelon offers a convincing pop, yet remains semi-sheer enough for a natural, day-into-night transition. The consistency stays smooth and non-tacky, a welcome departure from heavier lip oils on the market. On first swipe, there's an immediate sense of hydration that feels both soothing and lasting. It imparts a healthy, plump-looking lip appearance thanks to the reflective sheen. The Nectar Oil blend suggests conditioning benefits that help lips feel nurtured rather than parched as hours pass. The scent is light and soft, with a delicate sweetness that doesn't overwhelm the senses. Color builds nicely with a couple of swipes, deepening the pink without creeping outside the lip line. The glossiness remains relatively stable for several hours, fading gradually rather than leaving uneven patches. It pairs beautifully with minimal eye makeup or a clean, dewy cheek for a balanced look. The shade complements a wide range of skin tones, adding warmth and brightness to many undertones. Packaging adheres to Charlotte Tilbury's luxury aesthetic‚Äîsleek, sturdy, and easy to pop into a makeup bag. The wand delivers product evenly, reducing the need for extra blending tools. In terms of longevity, it won't mimic a full-coverage lipstick, but it provides a solid several hours of color and glow with touch-ups as needed. It reads as low-maintenance chic, ideal for busy days or quick social outings. The formula feels nourishing enough to soothe dryness without sacrificing color payoff. If you adore jelly-like lip products, Pink Watermelon fits comfortably in that category with a smoother, more refined finish. For someone seeking a hydrating lip option that still reads polished, this delivers with confidence. In summary, Unreal Lips Healthy Glow Nectar Oil in Pink Watermelon is a vibrant, conditioning-gloss hybrid that elevates everyday lips with a glassy glow and a cheerful pink warmth. In summary, Unreal Lips Healthy Glow Nectar Oil in Pink Watermelon is a vibrant, conditioning-gloss hybrid that elevates everyday lips with a glassy glow and a cheerful pink warmth.
faceoff_positive.headline: great lip gloss

faceoff_negative.comments:
Thank you @influenster & @charlottetilbury for sending me this complimentary Unreal Lips Healthy Glow Nectar Lip Oil in Coconut Water in exchange for my honest opinion. üíãü••

I love Charlotte Tilbury products, but this just didn't work out for me. üò¢ After about 15-20 minutes, my lips felt super tacky. It was very uncomfortable & I had to wash it off. 
I'm not sure if it's because I have very dry lips, despite it being very humid out, or what? 
The lip hugging applicator is nice & I love the coconut smell, but the formula itself is very uncomfortable. Also, it doesn't taste like coconut. It tastes like a lip oil. The Coconut Water scent is clear, too, so there's no tint. 
I'm a little bummed out this didn't work for me, but it might work for someone else. This is just my experience. 
I'm still a fan of Charlotte Tilbury products, but this specific product didn't win me over.
faceoff_negative.headline: It made my lips feel tacky.
